Review.Titre: 2 of the cards I got don't work
Review.Contenu: 2 of the cards I got don't work. Raspberry Pie keeps dropping out and can't handle the input from the miners. Had to pay extra $400 income tax to Australia. Power inputs needed to buy all new to fit Australian plugs. Waited over a month to get the product. Wrote emails and got no response.
After 20 days, still not shipped. No response or explanation despite repeated inquiry.

Review.Titre: I haven't received my order then have had scammers asking for more money. I am reporting this to the bank this morning
Review.Contenu: I haven't received my order. Also I got a message today saying I need to pay more when I paid for the extra secured postage. I am going to the bank today to report fraud.My response to your reply. After reading the reply I am still not happy. I paid THE EXTRA POSTAGE FEES TO SECURE SAFE TRAVEL AND ARRIVAL WHEN PURCHASED it also stated I would get it with in 7 days when I paid extra and now been over 2 weeks. So it should had included as you just stated in your reply. Regardless of the fact, I cancelled with my bank to get my money back. Extra $400 fees are not exceptable. Rubbish...

Had to remove other review. Sadly of the two items I previously ordered, one is now faulty after a week. I had several contacts with the company about it, and sent the required information and screenshots of the problem. At that point, I stopped getting responses from support. I tried several more times afterwards and still no reply. Very disappointing.

Review.Titre: Well  I ordered l3+ control board via…
Review.Contenu: Well  I ordered l3+ control board via PayPal , bitcoin merch canceled my order,refunded it, visa charged refund fee of $15, if you are going to cancel a order, at least you can contact the buyer, I would have settled for a gift card,  why do you have the PayPal option in the first place ? Well, good luck to everyoneUpdate : "The customer used multiple names, multiple addresses" Well that's a lie. Why would anyone use multiple name and address using paypal? And more important, why is a big site lying carelessly on easily verifiable things?

Order #35059 Order #35057They made me wait for one week after making the payments, then the orders where cancelled thereafter.Reason being i should use PayPal for payment.Don't buy from them it will end with premium tears

Ordered product. Took almost a week for them to ship it. Before they even shipped it I emailed them and asked them to cancel. 2hrs after I sent the email I got a notification saying a label was created emailed them again with no response till 5 hrs after the first email was sent. Responded with “sorry we read your email to late it’s already shipped” even on there site it’s says top tier customer support Aka email. Yea sorry 5hrs response time isn’t A tier.

I bought the 3 miners, raspberry pi 4 monitor, USB hub, heat fans, etc with the whole set up ready out of the box which i paid over a grand for. One of the miners seems to already have malfunctioned, but was treat with no difference than the other two. Heard more vibration than the other two upon start up and guess it didnt like that very much. The SD was generic and won't boot on the raspberry pi 4. I tried a couple other ones that also didn't work. I tried USB boot as well with no luck. I got two running out of three minus the raspberry pi .

ORDER #34598Order #34599ORDER #34597These r the order numbersWhich r not delivered and didn’t get any shipment notification yet . Its been already 1 week i paid for overnight shipment Solve my issue asap Pls

I love it. It was super easy to setup with the guide on the website. It's a wonderful addition to my desk and this is a company I am happy to support. Very kind, high vibe, and just creating a wonderful set of products. Here's to finding the next block! =DEdit: Used to be 5 stars. Down to 1 star. They did some update, Mars Lander 2.0. Now my hash rate slowly drops WAY below what it was. We are talking 30% lower. And there doesn't seem to be a way to downgrade when it was working well above spec. I use an ethernet connection as well. Way overpriced for the hash rate and now it's broken. Customer service hasn't been any help.

1. You sent me a unit that the SD card was unusable.   a.  No Offer to reimburse me or send a good card with the operating system.2. When I tried to use your instant help messaging nobody answered. That was 2 attempts made with nada. Finally, website contact and what did I get, a curt download it, with no explanation of where the file was to download.  Bad screen so I can't see anything.3.  The video screen doesn't work.  I worked and worked and in desperation contacted a friend with a blog site and we did a ZOOM meet up.  We went through the entire setup (he has one of the miners). He told me something was defective and to return it, so...4. This will be a return, and no, I do not want another one.   Junk machine and bad service!

Cool products and excellent customer service, I was surprised each time with the high level of customer service for both times I've ordered. They go above and beyond.

Received products, seemed packaged well so far,  I will leave a review once I get it set up and hashing. Thinking about starting a YouTube channel reviewing the miners you sell on your website.  I love the fast and reliable shipping. Thanks again have a great weekend.
Great product & support! Zeeshan was extremely helpful!

So I am a longtime customer of bitcoin merch's amazing products. But you never really know how a company is until you have a problem. Well,  let me tell you, THEY ARE AMAZING. I have been working with Zeeshan for the last couple of weeks because my mars lander's raspberry pi zero stopped working. Not only did he reach out almost daily to see how I was doing, he worked with me to first try and fix the problem so I would not have to send it in and be with out it. He even went as far as to put me in touch with the CEO. Just amazing. Unfortunately, we were not able to resolve my issue this way, so he immediately had me return the raspberry pi to have it evaluated. He keep me informed throughout the entire process (when he received it and how things we going). As soon as he was able to establish the problem, he immediately informed me of the issue and sent me a new raspberry pi. But not only did he send me the new raspberry pi, he made sure I got the new one up and running and everything back to where it was before it went down. I am a long time customer and will remain one for even longer. Thank you Zeeshan for the amazing customer service!james

Every time I order from these pros, it is an awesome experience. Even when something might be off with the order, they handle above and beyond my expectations. I am going to keep ordering from them, just don't tell the wife.

I couldn't be more happy with BitcoinMerch, thanks for everything Idan!

I got a bad unit but also world-class service to make it right! They fully refunded my order and even gave me exclusive access on a new project atop of the refund.  BitcoinMerch is awesome 😎 thanks for everything Idan!

Review.Titre: Fast response for a non-functional device
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with a device and they sent a replacement immediately. New device works great! Easy return process of the old one.
Bought a Mars Lander but I needed a new acrylic cover as it was damaged. They sent me a new one, packed it really well and with the updated design and even peeled the paper off for me. Thanks!

If I’m being honest, Bitcoin Merch has to be one of the best businesses I’ve purchased from, not just relating to crypto hardware. Every step/stage of the sales process has been amazing. The website is spot on, very easy to navigate, nice clean and simple to use with lots of information and videos for support, the products are great and shipped well with good packaging, the service/after care has been spot on. They clearly understand the importance of adding value at each step of the way to help to help increase their customer base/sales. What a great business, don’t need to shop at any other sites.

Very satisfied with Bitcoinmerch.Good packaging and excellent service, I missed the remote control of my Marslander contacted by email and it is delivered without any problems.They indicate that the Marslander 250 GH/s, but I get 300.4 GH/s with the cable, so this Marslander is an excellent product.Just a tip for ordering in Europe, order the USB internet adapter and also the plug for Europe.Keep it up! Thank you

Review.Titre: I am very satisfied with my purchase of 10 Port Powered USB Hub
Review.Contenu: I am very satisfied with my purchase of 2 of 10 Port Powered USB Hub. The build quality is excellent and it feels sturdy and well-constructed. The hub performs well, providing consistent data transfer speeds, and has enough power to charge all my devices. The design is also sleek and easy to use, with a convenient on/off switch. Overall, I highly recommend this product. Additionally, the seller provided great customer service, answering all my questions promptly.

I have been looking forward to get this miner and just got it in today. I quickly set it up with no issues (took less than 10 minutes making sure I put correct info, and yes I am a rookie doing this) running smoothly so far...between purchase and receiving it was pretty standard since I was in no major rush to get it. May think about getting a second one down the road....👍👍👍👍👍

Review.Titre: Guys are truly awesome. 3rd time around...
Review.Contenu: My third time using them, just for solo mining fun I thought I had gotten a defective unit but just the power supply was bad after trouble shooting and they sent me a new one right away no questions asked. They really stand behind their products and definitely make sure you are satisfied with whatever you had bought. I highly recommend them even if just for novelty fun as the Mars Landers are super cool and fun units to play with and learn. You get that ticker too for the constant price updates. Hopefully they can add more to (different currency) the ticker system in the future!

The R909 pod, connected to Mars lander is really awesome,  doing 2.01 Th,  these things look good together,  work great together,   and if like me, need a little help getting up and running,  Idan works with you,  this my 2nd purchase,  can't wait to get more.

Review.Titre: The PET cover mars lander and power supply
Review.Contenu: The PET cover of the mars lander I received was disassembled. Seems like there is not enough adhesive was put to hold it together. Also, I read on the website that the package includes a 5V 5A power supply that is missing in the box. Idan from Bitcoin Merch reached out to me immediately and send the missing item and replaced the damaged cover. I'm very thankful for the excellent after sales service provided.

Review.Titre: Excellent bitcoin miner and buying experience
Review.Contenu: The buying experience from BitcoinMerch was easy and good overall. The product was shipped to me quickly and was packaged well. The miner itself was easy to get going and is quiet. It is actually the perfect way to mine Bitcoin at home and has been made easier for first-time users. Even though the chances are slim at finding a Bitcoin block with such a small hashrate, you are also not spending a lot of money on electricity to have your hand in the game. The fact that it is quiet is another bonus you don't often get with Bitcoin miners. If you have expensive electricity and don't like noise but you want to be part of the Bitcoin ecosystem, this miner is THE way to do it. Oh and it's much easier than dealing with a stick miner and mining software and running a computer 24/7. Win/Win

Review.Titre: The product I ordered arrived quickly…
Review.Contenu: The product I ordered arrived quickly and works as expected. Very simple to setup and any additional questions I had were resolved quickly via chat. I will definitely keep coming back for additional hardware.Thanks againFabio

Review.Titre: Best solo miner on the market, and best customer service in the game!!
Review.Contenu: I had many troubles with my mar lander and setting it up. But the customer service is absolutely awesome and I highly recommend this miner. It's awesome and looks just as awesome!! Very well built product and good on the electric bill. I would recommend this to anyone trying to get in to mining crypto or has been in the game!! 10/10 I plan on buying more in the future!!
Great prices, fast responses and great support! I've purchased multiple items from them and plan to purchase more in the future.

Review.Titre: The support while machine was down.
Review.Contenu: The support when my machine was having issues was excellent. My machine was experiencing low hash rate problems, and a replacement power supply, the new one, solved the problem and made my machine run better and faster. Excellent work!

Review.Titre: I bought orginally a 7 port USB

Review.Titre: As advertised! The MARS LANDER is pretty cool!

Excellent customer service.Update: I had a weak WiFi signal and I do not have access to the router. They suggested a USB Wifi antenna and it totally boosted the signal...I'm clocking at 280+ GH/s!

Review.Titre: Idan is there to support and…
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased the Gekko Science Compacf ASIC miner from this site, and I couldn't be happier with my experience. The transaction process was smooth and hassle-free, and the product arrived promptly, well-packaged and in perfect condition.The Gekko Science Compacf ASIC miner itself is a powerhouse! It exceeded my expectations in terms of performance and efficiency. Not only is this miner incredibly efficient, but it's also surprisingly quiet, which is a huge plus for me.The build quality is outstanding, and it's evident that this product is designed to last. The durability and reliability of the Gekko Science Compacf ASIC miner give me confidence in its long-term performance.Overall, I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase and the service provided by Idan.I highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a top-notch power efficient starter ASIC miner. Kudos to the team for delivering such an exceptional product!

I had a product show up with damage, I emailed them that night I received the product the next morning when they were open I received a email wanting my order# sent the # along with a picture with in 2hrs I had a email saying my new part was it's way with, NO HASSLES OR DO THIS OR DO THAT. I will use them FRIST in the future. THANKS AGAIN!!! Oh yeah the shipping was very quick, it comes from the USA.
Customer service answered email timely. The item was shipped promptly and they have several different payment methods. I will buy from them again.

Want to get into bitcoin miner and was looking for a affordable solution.  I purchased the Mars Lander and had it up and running in 15 mins. I also setup pooling. So far very happy with the service and miner.

Review.Titre: Good shopping, order, & after sale support experience
Review.Contenu: The shopping experience and order delivery were excellent. However, detailed technical specs for the fans and USB hub are missing. Of the 3 fans I purchased, one produces a loud vibration buzz. The 7-port USB hub's structure also produces loud vibration noise when any of the fans is running (louder with all 3 on), thus requiring specific placement with additional dampening/suppression to prevent it from vibrating as much and making the loud buzz noise that it does on its own when placed upright directly on a solid surface.EDIT 2/26/23: Bitcoin Merch sent me a fan to replace the one that has the excessive vibration and noise issue, and the new fan works quite well with no issues. I very much appreciate Idan's response and action to send me a replacement fan. When I wrote the review, I had not reached out to Bitcoin Merch yet to notify them of the issue, but they seem to be on top of things and took action based on my review of the items and before I had the chance to contact them about the issue. This is how one ensures repeat customers.

Review.Titre: The delivery was quick and my solo…
Review.Contenu: The delivery was quick and my solo bitcoin miner was in good working order. I wish I would of order my other miner from you guys. I'm still waiting on the one I purchase from gold shell.
